James Coolidge Web developer / Designer

About me

I am a computer science student with a passion for web development. My fascination with web technology commenced immediately after witnessing my first webpage flash into life on my browser in the fall of 2019. Since that day, I have striven to improve my skills and knowledge in web-related technologies.
